tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_opinion_survey (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_name TEXT,
    political_party TEXT,
    issue_1_sentiment INT,
    issue_2_sentiment INT
);

CREATE TABLE public_opinion_surveys (
    survey_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id UUID,
    survey_date DATE,
    political_issue VARCHAR,
    response VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE survey_data (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    political_party VARCHAR,
    opinion_1 VARCHAR,
    opinion_2 VARCHAR
);
CREATE TABLE voters ( voter_id INT, voter_name VARCHAR(255), age INT, party_affiliation VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE issues ( issue_id INT, issue_name VARCHAR(255), issue_description TEXT );
CREATE TABLE survey_responses ( response_id INT, voter_id INT, issue_id INT, response VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE political_parties ( party_id INT, party_name VARCHAR(100), party_leader VARCHAR(100) );

CREATE TABLE SurveyParticipants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    issue_id INT,
    response_text TEXT,
    response_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE PoliticalIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_title VARCHAR(255),
    issue_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VoterSentiment (
    sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    issue_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id INT,
    agree_count INT,
    disagree_count INT,
    neutral_count INT
)
